attributes.action: Don't start a war with Russia!
attributes.background: With all the tension going on, war is looking likely. Why should the government get the right to decide who goes to war and not the people. NO ONE WANTS A WAR!

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you're concerned about the UK taking military action in Syria, you may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/217290
